Name: Satan's Kittens
Description: A member of Tortuga City's ruling council, the Satan's Kittens are led by Laura 'Kitten' Murray and were one of Paula Trevaline's main allies in the deposition of the former ruler of the Tortuga Dominions, Lord Kalvin Bar-Dyness. The Kittens are known for avoiding fighting outside their own terms, and for their infamous use of fire as a terror weapon against both civilian and military targets.
ReputationStatements: You might be of use to the Satan's Kittens. Or not.

The Satan's Kittens require your services. Perform them well and we might end discussing other uses for you.
MissionSuccessStatements: And not a single C-bill was wasted by us in hiring you, mercenary. Stellar job, from our perspective.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: We are ready to forget about this issue if you buy us the first round. And a lot more rounds after.
BadFaithFailureStatements: I am... disappointed... leave now before we use you for flamer practice.
